#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

main(){
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        int a[100001];
        int n,m;
        scanf("%d %d",&n,&m);
        for(int i=0; i<=n-1; i++){
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
        }
        long long x = 0;
        for(int i = 0; i <= n-1; i++){
            if(i < m) x += a[i];
            else{ x -= a[i]/2;}
           // cout<<x<<endl;
        }
        if(x <= 0) printf("DEFEAT \n");
        else { printf("VICTORY \n"); }
    }
}
